subtitle: Please join us for our wedding celebration on
subtitle3: Days left until the big day
ourStory: This is a summary of our story
theWedding: Join us in celebrating a night of our love and life together. On Lake Como's coast, Hotel Villa Cipressi sets the mood for the perfect romantic getaway where we will tie the knot. More details to follow.
gallery: Here is a gallery of images
accommodations: If you wish to stay at Hotel Villa Cipressi or Royal Victoria, we have a discounted rate for our guests. You may contact the hotel directly by email (info@hotelvillacipressi.it) let them know you need to book a room to attend Karen Ardila and Lucas de Souza’s wedding from September 12-14th 2023
howToArrive: Once in the Milan airport, guests will take the Milano Centrale to Varenna- esino train station arriving directly in Varenna
travelAgent: If you wish to visit other places in Europe, our travel agent Luciane Garcia will be happy to help you with the plane tickets, planning your itinerary, and finding accommodations. Please note bookings can only be made as early as October 2022
transportation: Safe Airport Transfers to and from Lake Como - Milan Area

story.name: First met
story.text: We first met at a mutual friend's Halloween party

story.name: Started dating
story.text: We quickly fell in love and became high school sweethearts

story.name: Start of our life together
story.text: We got our first apartment and moved out together with our two dogs, Toto & Chloe

story.name: Home sweet home
story.text: We bought our first home and gave our dogs the backyard they deserved

story.name: She said yes
story.text: We got engaged while watching the most beautiful sunset on a sailboat in Croatia

faq.question: What is the dress code for the ceremony and reception?

answer.title: Men
answer.value: Tuxedo or formal suit, tie or bowtie, leather shoes or loafers.

answer.title: Women
answer.value: Gown or long formal dress. Block heels are recommended as the wedding will be in a pebbled garden. Please refrain from wearing the color light blue as this is the respective bridal color.

faq.question: What is the dress code for the welcome event?

answer.title: Men
answer.value: Seasonal sport coat or blazer, dress shirt, casual button-down shirt, open-collar or polo shirt, slacks.

answer.title: Women
answer.value: Cocktail dress, afternoon dress, midi or maxi dress, long dressy skirt and top, dressy separates.

faq.question: What is the dress code for the farewell event?
What will the weather be like for this time of year?

answer.value: Expect warm temperatures of around 80 degrees Fahrenheit or 25-27 degrees celsius.

faq.question: Will the ceremony and reception be indoors or outdoors?

answer.value: The plan to have the ceremony and reception outdoors, however we can move indoors if it rains.

faq.question: When should we arrive in Europe?

answer.value: We highly suggest you arrive a few days before the welcome event, this will allow you to adjust to the different timezone and avoid jet-lag.

We highly recommend you stay in Varenna, staying anywhere that’s not in Varenna would require you to hire a boat transfer or rent a car to get to Varenna. Lake Como is pretty big and getting around requires a lot of planning in advance. There are plenty of Airbnbs and hotel options to choose from in Varenna, we recommend you book months early due to the high season.
Our wedding is strictly RSVP only. We will only able to accommodate those listed on your invitation.
